venue.title: Find Us in Upper Town
venue.description: Located in the heart of Gornji Grad, our covered courtyard offers an intimate, weather-protected Christmas experience. Easily accessible by tram or a scenic walk through Zagreb's historic Upper Town.

heritage.title: Croatian Christmas Traditions
content: Inspired by Croatian traditions—from licitar hearts to handmade wooden toys—Doma Si celebrates warmth, craftsmanship, and togetherness.
Zagreb Advent has won multiple awards as one of Europe's best Christmas markets. We honor that legacy while creating an intimate, premium experience rooted in authentic Croatian hospitality.

cta.title: Plan Your Visit
cta.description: Join us for an unforgettable Advent experience. Whether you're celebrating with friends or organizing a private event, we're here to make your holiday season special.
